import React,{Component} from 'react'; import './Addproduct.css' // import axios from "axios" import axios, { post } from 'axios'; class Addproduct extends Component{ constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { Name:"", Price:0, NewPrice:0, Link:"", Description:"", name_kodau:"", file1:"", file2:"", file3:"", file4:"", file5:"", file6:"", file7:"", file8:"", file9:"", file10:"", file11:"", file12:"", file13:"", file14:"", file15:"" }; } onChange1=(e)=> { var name=e.target.name; this.setState({[name]:e.target.files[0]}) } add=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); var Name=this.state.Name; var Price=this.state.Price; var NewPrice=this.state.NewPrice; var Link=this.state.Link; var Description=this.state.Description; var name_kodau=this.state.name_kodau; const formData = new FormData(); // console.log(this.state.file) formData.append('file',this.state.file1) formData.append('file',this.state.file2) formData.append('file',this.state.file3) formData.append('file',this.state.file4) formData.append('file',this.state.file5) formData.append('file',this.state.file6) formData.append('file',this.state.file7) formData.append('file',this.state.file8) formData.append('file',this.state.file9) formData.append('file',this.state.file10) formData.append('file',this.state.file11) formData.append('file',this.state.file12) formData.append('file',this.state.file13) formData.append('file',this.state.file14) formData.append('file',this.state.file15) const config = { headers: { authorization:'hoanganh' } } axios.post('/addproduct',{Name:Name,Price:Price,NewPrice:NewPrice,Link:Link,Description:Description,name_kodau:name_kodau}) .then(res=>{ console.log(res.data); }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) axios.post('/addimg1',formData,config,{Name:Name,Price:Price,NewPrice:NewPrice,Link:Link,Description:Description,name_kodau:name_kodau}) .then(res=>{ console.log(res.data); }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } onChange =(e)=>{ // console.log(e.target) var name=e.target.name; var value=e.target.value; this.setState({ [name]:value }) } render(){ return(
